name: El Taco Diablo
description:
Only your accuracy and speed will help you survive endless waves of enemies.
If your skills are high enough, survive and face "El Taco Diablo" himself.
Compete against your friends or on a global scale, where every second matters.
Practice split second decision making or just warm up before going into battle with your favorite action game.Gameplay Features:
  • Stylized Demonic Tacos
  • Nextgen Taco Graphics
  • Mariachi Inspired Rock Soundtrack
  • 8 Different Enemies with Unique Abilities and Weaknesses
  • 3 Weapons to Master
